# test_file_1table_edge_cases.docx

---
filename: test_file_1table_edge_cases.docx

---

Table with corners cases

Table1

| Language | Text | Pipe\\test | Direction |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Language | Text | Pipe\\test | Direction |
| English | The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. | Test with pipe \\ | LTR |
| Français | Le renard brun rapide saute par-dessus le chien paresseux. | Test with \\\\ double pipe | LTR |
| Deutsch | Der schnelle braune Fuchs springt über den faulen Hund. | Test with “\\” double pipe in quotes | LTR |
| Español | El rápido zorro marrón salta sobre el perro perezoso. | Test with “\\\\\\” triple pipe in quotes | LTR |
